attributes.action: Repeat the 80s cartoon Dogtanian and the 3 Muskehounds on BBC1
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dogtanian was a cartoon first shown in the UK in 1985 on CBBC.  It was massively popular and the theme tune became a household name.  Today's children are fed a diet of mainly US-imported cartoons which lack the in-depth storylines and quality of older shows.
In these cheerless, cash-strapped times, I urge the Prime Minister to contact the rights holder BRB International SA of Madrid, to air Dogtanian again on TV so that those of us who were children in the 80s can enjoy 30 minutes of entertainment and today's children too.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
